price: Dia mengetahui apa yang masuk ke dalam bumi, apa yang ke luar darinya, apa yang turun dari langit, dan apa yang naik kepadanya.  Dan Dia-lah Yang Maha Penyayang lagi Maha Pengampun.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā yaliju fī al-arḍi wamā yakhruju min'hā wamā yanzilu mina al-samāi wamā yaʿruju fīhā wahuwa al-raḥīmu al-ghafūru
